document.full_text: most valuable player derrick rose of the chicago bulls and lebron james of the miami heat, winner of the two previous mvp awards, were selected for this season's all-nba team, the league said on thursday.
document.title: rose, james and howard headline all-nba selections
lines_and_colors: most valuable player derrick rose of the chicago bulls and lebron james of the miami heat, winner of the two previous mvp awards, were selected for this season's all-nba team, the league said on thursday.
